item.title: Youtube History Visualisation in Plotly
item.author: Author
item.description: The following learning project is intended to help me learn concepts around the steps required to create a visualisation in python, but also explore the kind of information that is stored by companies such as YouTube (Google). Objectives Data Preparation: Data preparation makes up ~80% of the work in a Data Science pipeline. I’d like to explore the best techniques to go from raw CSV data, to a tabular format that is ready for data visualisation.
